  • Constructor Details

    • TeamRepository

      public TeamRepository()
      Constructs a new TeamRepository with an empty list of teams.

  • Method Details

    • generateTeam

      public Optional<Team> generateTeam(SkillList skills, List<Collaborator> collaboratorList, int minCollaborators, int maxCollaborators)
      Attempts to generate a team based on the provided skills, collaborator list, and constraints.
      Parameters:
      skills - The required skills for the team.
      collaboratorList - The list of available collaborators.
      minCollaborators - The minimum number of collaborators required for the team.
      maxCollaborators - The maximum number of collaborators allowed for the team.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the generated team if successful, otherwise an empty Optional.

    • checkTeamCollaborators

      public boolean checkTeamCollaborators(Team team)
      Checks if the collaborators of the given team are equal to the collaborators of any team in the auxiliary team list.
      Parameters:
      team - The team whose collaborators need to be checked.
      Returns:
      true if the collaborators of the given team are not equal to any team in the auxiliary team list, false otherwise.

    • addTeam

      public void addTeam(int teamId)
      Adds a team with the given team ID to the team list. If the team ID already exists, it assigns a new team ID and adds the team to the list.
      Parameters:
      teamId - The team ID of the team to be added.

    • cleanTeamListAux

      public void cleanTeamListAux()
      Clears the auxiliary team list by assigning a new empty ArrayList to it.

    • generatedList

      public List<Team> generatedList()
      Generates a new list containing the teams from the auxiliary team list.
      Returns:
      A new list containing the teams from the auxiliary team list.

    • getTeamList

      public List<Team> getTeamList()
      Returns a clone of the list of teams.
      Returns:
      A cloned list of teams to avoid side effects and outside manipulation.

    • clone

      public List<Team> clone()
      Clones the list of teams.
      Overrides:
      clone in class Object
      Returns:
      A new list of teams with the same content as the original one.

    • removeTeam

      public void removeTeam(int teamId)
      Removes a team from the repository based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      teamId - The ID of the team to be removed.

    • getListTeam

      public List<Team> getListTeam()
      Retrieves the list of teams.
      Returns:
      The list of teams.

    • add

      public void add(Team team)
      Adds a team to the list of teams.
      Parameters:
      team - The team to be added.
